name: Protective Lip Treatment
about: What it is:A sunscreen for lips utilizing adaptable inner-shield technology that supports skin’s natural protective abilities..Skin Type:Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract: Improves Supports blood oxygen saturation..What Else You Need to Know:This lip treatment provides effective protection from the sun’s damaging rays and selectively allows the latent benefits of red light in sunlight to be passed through to the skin. With reapplication, the velvety-smooth melting texture replenishes the lips with up to 24 hours of hydration.
ingredients: - Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract: Supports blood oxygen saturation..- Argania Spinosa​ Kernel Oil Extract: Protects the stratum corneum of the lips..- Potentilla Erecta Root Extract: Targets enzyme activity responsible for collagen..-Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract: Improves blood oxygen saturation..-Argania Spinosa​ Kernel Oil Extract: Protects the stratum corneum of the lips..-Potentilla Erecta Root Extract: Inhibits enzyme activity responsible for collagen...Avobenzone 2.3%, Homosalate 10.0%, Octisalate 5.0%, Octocrylene 5.0%.Inactive Ingredients: Water,Butylene Glycol,Glycerin,Silica,Glyceryl Diisostearate,Alcohol Denat.,Caprylyl Methicone,Behenyl Alcohol,C30-45 Alkyl Methicone,Dipropylene Glycol,Dimethicone,Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Crosspolymer,Xanthan Gum,Trehalose,Tocopheryl Acetate,2-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid,Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract,Glycine,Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether,Thymus Serpyllum Extract,Garcinia Mangostana Bark Extract,Panax Ginseng Root Extract,Fagus Sylvatica Bud Extract,Aminoethanesulfinic Acid,Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract,Angelica Acutiloba Root Extract,Hydrolyzed Conchiolin Protein,Hydrolyzed Silk,Perilla Ocymoides Leaf Extract,Polyquaternium-51,Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract,Saxifraga Sarmentosa Extract,Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract,Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract,Beheneth-20,C30-45 Olefin,Stearyl Alcohol,Disodium Edta,Carbomer,Potassium Hydroxide,Tocopherol,Sodium Metaphosphate,Bht,Alcohol,Sodium Metabisulfite,Theanine,Syzygium Jambos Leaf Extract,Phenoxyethanol,Fragrance,Iron Oxides,Titanium Dioxide,Mica.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swivel up the bullet and apply to lips. Reapply throughout the day as needed.​.-May also be applied slightly beyond the lip contour to create a more defined lip look.

reviews.review_title: Had high hopes but it’s just ok
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of the balm is nice: not sticky or strongly scented. But it doesn’t have a lasting effect. It dries my lips and I need to reapply frequently. The cap falls off too easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's pricey. The cap is very light and flimsy. It is not worth this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy occasional splurges, and this was my treat to myself. There aren’t enough lip products out there with SPF, so I wanted to try this one out. Right away I was disappointed in the packaging. It feels light and flimsy. The product was better, with a pleasant floral scent and nice texture, but at 4grams, it’s very pricey. I’ll use it up but won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After I receive it , I tried put together , when I pull the lid off the lip cream. Broken in pieces.. very disappointing
